body: This aint ntr xdd
this story is like a sequel of something, seriously, it's like this is only a extra chapter =_=

It's NTR cause it says "The Secret of the Senpai I admire". Now he might not like her but it is NTR in a small way. But if you don't give a fuck it's not NTR. You can just assume that the guy isn't interested in her

@ayami123 literally saying bullshit.. come on guys, just type "netori meaning" on google and you find it. It gotta be at least the love interest of someone to consider it ntr.

I'm 100% sure that some people here call it nettori because the language and art style looks similar, but replace the young man with an old pervert man who's fapping on them while licking his lips, would you still think it's ntr ?
This isn't ntr

applying ntr to the guy who just admire the chick. well if im that sensitive, sexy busty chick from vanilla realistically will have dozens who likes her, oh man poor those dozens of them who cucked by boring pure mc, i would cry for them T_T
Friendly reminder that an NTR doesn't need to have cheating in it to be considered NTR.

This didn't felt like an ntr to me

The guy isn't even friends with the girl, just a mid crush (we didn't even see him gush over her nor at least masturbate to her so we can say he didn't had any romantic nor sexual attraction to her), nor the girl has any crush or even had any relations with the guy, both are just acquainted by being Classmates. So @Ozire, you're reaching you tard, that's like saying everyone is being NTRed each time their celebrity "crush" gets laid, which just shows that you have a severe mental illness and you need to be admitted to a mental hospital.
This is not NTR, the dude and the chick dont have any relation (gf/bf or husband/wife) if u gonna call this ntr, did u get ntr-ed by other dude that manage to date your crush ?
The mental gymnastics some beta cucks do to prove this is ntr lol, is not period

I don't get why people are still playing clueless. NTR is more of an umbrella term (and moreover, a genre) at this point, and that the main point of NTR is to invoke jealousy. It's a pretty flexible concept that doesn't have to be cut and dry the MC's girlfriend getting blasted. Guy watching his proper senpai get corrupted by the ladykiller of his school, most people would read this and feel some sort of jealousy. If that's not enough though, the "You wouldn't do that...right, Senpai?..." line shows MC clearly likes or respects her in some capacity. It's clearly provoking the feeling of someone being stolen from the MC. It's the same as when one of the MC's love interests gets fucked even if they're not dating. It doesn't matter.
it's not NTR if you don't give a fuck.
This is peak denial

This isn't even NTR lol. Unless the reader is suppose to be the one in a relationship with the girl.
